io.lettuce.core

类 SocketOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.SocketOptions

  • public class SocketOptions
extends Object
    Options to configure low-level socket options for the connections kept to Redis servers.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.3

      • copyOf

        public static SocketOptions copyOf(SocketOptions options)
        Create a copy of options
        参数:
        options - the original
        返回:
        A new instance of SocketOptions containing the values of options

      • builder

        public static SocketOptions.Builder builder()
        Returns a new SocketOptions.Builder to construct SocketOptions.
        返回:
        a new SocketOptions.Builder to construct SocketOptions.

      • create

        public static SocketOptions create()
        Create a new SocketOptions using default settings.
        返回:
        a new instance of default cluster client client options.

      • getConnectTimeout

        public Duration getConnectTimeout()
        Returns the connection timeout.
        返回:
        the connection timeout.

      • isKeepAlive

        public boolean isKeepAlive()
        Returns whether to enable TCP keepalive.
        返回:
        whether to enable TCP keepalive
        另请参阅:
        SocketOptions.SO_KEEPALIVE

      • isTcpNoDelay

        public boolean isTcpNoDelay()
        Returns whether to use TCP NoDelay.
        返回:
        true to disable Nagle's algorithm, false to enable Nagle's algorithm.
        另请参阅:
        SocketOptions.TCP_NODELAY
